markdown:
<title level="1" right="Cantrip 2" pfs="Standard">[Triple Time](/Spells.aspx?ID=392)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=19" />
<trait label="Cantrip" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=22" />
<trait label="Composition" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=31" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 387 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 60-foot emanation

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 round
</row>

</column>

---

You dance at a lively tempo, speeding your allies' movement. You and all allies in the area gain a +10-foot status bonus to all Speeds for 1 round.
name: Triple Time

text: Triple Time Source Core Rulebook pg. 387 4.0 Cast Single Action somatic Area 60-foot emanation Duration 1 round --- You dance at a lively tempo, speeding your allies' movement. You and all allies in the area gain a +10-foot status bonus to all Speeds for 1 round.
